page.title: 15Smarden W. - Unigate Dairies
page.content: Unigate Dairies is the major employer in the Headcorn/Smarden area. Over 160 people work there, either in the retail division, the processing plant or in the garage. The bulk milk tankers collect raw milk from farms in central Kent and E Sussex. Returning to Unigate the milk is processed and packed into bottles, cartons, catering packs and polybottles. The milk is then distributed by lorry to most of Kent and E Sussex. The delivery roundsmen are also based at Unigate Dairies. Their electric milk floats are a familiar sight in the countryside. Not only do they deliver milk to their 6200 customers but also a food product range which includes bread, potatoes and soft drinks. The garage at Unigate maintains the lorries and milk floats from the entire area.
